content.chinese:
棒棒的岩袋鼠
故事作者：[ 澳 ] 丽贝卡 •约翰逊 著 贺舒雅 译
content.english: Wonderful Wallaby

content.chinese: 辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈感到十分担忧。
content.english: The bridled nailtail wallaby was very worried.

content.chinese: 因为在它睡觉的时候，它的幼袋鼠走丢了，它到处找都找不到它的幼袋鼠。
content.english: Her little joey had wandered off whileshe was sleeping and she could notfind her anywhere.

content.chinese: 更糟糕的是，在它的头顶上方，一只巨大的老鹰正在空中盘旋。
content.english: To make it worse,a large eagle wascircling in the skyabove her.

content.chinese: "天哪，我要怎么办呢？" 它一边哭一边慌张地跳来跳去。
content.english: "Oh, what will I do?" shecried, as she hoppedaround frantically.

content.chinese: 一只身材高大的红袋鼠听到了辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈的哭声。
content.english: The big redkangaroo heardher cries.

content.chinese: "出什么事了？"红袋鼠问。
content.english: "What's the problem?"he asked.

content.chinese: "我的幼袋鼠走丢了，而且现在有一只老鹰正盯着这一带呢！"辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈啜泣道。
content.english: "My joey haswandered off andnow there is an eaglewatching," sobbed the mother nailtail.

content.chinese: "我明白了，"红袋鼠说，"这的确是个问题。"
content.english: "I see," said thekangaroo. "That isa problem."

content.chinese: "我来告诉你谁擅长解决问题，"红袋鼠说，"那就是马里巴岩袋鼠。
content.english: "I'll tell you who is good at solving problems," he said, "the Mareeba rock-wallaby.

content.chinese: "有一次发生火灾时，它帮助过我们。 据我所知，它住在岩石中间的高处。"
content.english: "He helped us once when there was a fire. He lives up there in the rocks."

content.chinese: "你为什么不去找它呢？放心，我会留在这里继续搜寻的。"
content.english: "Why don't you go and find him and I'll check down here?"

content.chinese: "好主意！"辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈得到了红袋鼠的帮助，心里感到很高兴。
content.english: "Good idea," said the mother nailtail, feeling very glad to have some help.

content.chinese: 辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈很快就找到了岩袋鼠，把发生的事情都告诉了它。
content.english: She quickly found the rock-wallaby and told him the problem.

content.chinese: "好的，"岩袋鼠说，"时间紧迫，我会搜寻所有我知道的地方，没准儿小辔甲尾袋鼠会藏在那里。"
content.english: "Right," he said, "there's no time to lose. I'll check all the places I know where she could be hiding."

content.chinese: 岩袋鼠像子弹一样飞快地冲了出去，它环顾四周，仔细地查找每一处地方
content.english: The rock-wallaby was off like a shot, looking in every direction.

content.chinese: 它检查了岩石上的每一处裂缝。
content.english: He checked every crack in the rocks,

content.chinese: 它边走边闻着地面，搜寻小辔甲尾袋鼠可能留下的气味。
content.english: and sniffed the ground for any scent the little nailtail may have left behind.

content.chinese: 辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈看到老鹰离这一带更近了。
content.english: The mother nailtail saw that the eagle had come closer.

content.chinese: 为了转移老鹰的注意力，它不停地跳上跳下。
content.english: She jumped up and down to distract it.

content.chinese: "找到它啦！"聪明的岩袋鼠的喊声传来。
content.english: "Found her!" came the clever rock-wallaby's voice.

words.tsWord: （动物因害怕或准备攻击而）蜷伏

content.chinese: 果真找到了！小辔甲尾袋鼠蜷缩成一团，躲在草丛里，吓得动弹不得。
content.english: And, sure enough, the little nailtail was crouched, hiding in a clump of grass, too scared to move.

content.chinese: "太好了，谢谢你！"辔甲尾袋鼠妈妈欢呼道，"红袋鼠说得对，你总是能给大家提供帮助。"
content.english: "Oh, thank you!" cheered the mother nailtail. "The kangaroo was right. You always come to the rescue."
